BESS capacity derived from assets.json solar_002 budget / cost_per_kWh

Annual battery degradation at 456 cycles (benchmark: 2% at 260 / 4% at 730)
Total annual cycles: HD 182 + LD 274 (2-cycle seasonal model)
4 phases from Lanseria Infrastructure Funding Report (March 2020)
Ultimate demand: 15000 houses x 6kVA x 0.7 x 1.5 = 94.5 MW
